thread.section_title: Rustic Borneo Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rustic Borneo Travel | www.rustic-borneo.com
thread.title: Camille Royal
thread.title_full: Rustic Borneo Travel reviewed by Camille Royal

author: Camille Royal
title: Camille Royal
text:
My Husband and I spent our Honeymoon in Borneo utilising Rustic Borneo's Travel itinerary. We had an amazing time! Every aspect of our trip was seamless, and extremely prompt. All the staff that we encountered were extremely polite, professional and helpful.
We had one day on our trip that didn't go quite to plan, but Rustic Borneo changed our travel plans immediately with no hassle.
We rate the operating standard of Rustic Borneo extremely highly and we are hoping to be back in Borneo utilising their expertise again in the near future. Definitely a 5/5!!
